name: Me. Fire. Run. Cave.
description:
Caveman: Me find fire and run to cave. Me keep fire alive.

See if you can avoid the obstacles on the way back to your cave with your fire and "keep it alive" in this 3 level platformer.

- Don't let the ankylosauruses bite you.

- Don't let the clouds rain on you.

- Don't fall in the water.
